name: Bone Antlers
description:
Shoot slimes to survive as long as you can in this top down shooter with infinite spawn and increasing difficulty.

This is my first game ever ! Nothing much, just a top down shooter I did while learning how to code.
If it give you 10 minutes of fun during your lunch time it would make me very happy !

Please consider following me as more games will be on their way !

And if you like the look of the game, please consider following me on twitter at https://twitter.com/Calamarik

or on https://www.twitch.tv/calamarik

Have fun !
